esema eki madhyaye hasirima gochara nam ehi yam wadagathkamak pawathi nam eeta anugathawa katayuthu kirime da waradak natha.esema grahakayin wicharashiliwa janamadhya bhawitha karanu labanne nam eya wadath paladayi wanu atha.wicharashili yana padayen artha nirupanaya wanne kisiyam deyak pilibandawa wimasima, wimarshanaya, wishleshanaya menma wagakimakin yukthawa katayuthu kirima pilibandawa pudgalayaku sathu nipunathawayi.
